  'bruceR',

```{r}
df <- df %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    condition = factor(condition, levels = c("TR_main", "TIR_main")),
    shapes = factor(shapes, levels = c("自我", "朋友", "生人")),
    ismatch = case_when(
      ismatch == "1" ~ "match",
      ismatch == "0" ~ "mismatch",
    ),
    ismatch = factor(ismatch, levels = c("match", "mismatch")),
    subj_idx = factor(subj_idx)
  )
df
```

# 参考JASP源码中用到的函数及参数设定

```{r}

# try2: 数量级相差不多，判断结果一致；AI多次给的解决方案都是这个

# 计算不同模型的BF10：3个变量会有19个模型，主效应（3+3+1）、二阶交互（3+3+3+1）、三阶交互（1）、零模型

# 零模型：截距+随机斜率,lmBF在设定whichRandom参数时，自动将BF分母设为如下null_model
# null_model <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
#   formula = RT_m ~ 1 + subj_idx,
#   data = df,
#   whichRandom = "subj_idx",
#   progress = FALSE,
#   posterior = FALSE,
# )

# 输出全模型（主效应+二阶交互+三阶交互）与null模型比较结果BF10
full_model <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~ condition*shapes*ismatch + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
  rscaleFixed = "medium",
  rscaleRandom = "medium",
  rscaleCont = "medium",
  rscaleEffects = NULL,
  iterations= 10000
  )

# 去除三阶交互效应的模型（主效应+二阶交互）
model_no_3way <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~  condition + shapes + ismatch + condition:shapes + condition:ismatch + shapes:ismatch + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
)

# 不包含condition:shapes二阶交互效应的模型
model_no_condition_shapes <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~  condition + shapes + ismatch + condition:ismatch + shapes:ismatch + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
)

# 不包含condition:ismatch二阶交互效应的模型
model_no_condition_ismatch <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~  condition + shapes + ismatch + condition:shapes + shapes:ismatch + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
)

# 不包含shapes*mismatch二阶交互效应的模型
model_no_shapes_ismatch <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~  condition + shapes + ismatch + condition:shapes + condition:ismatch + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
)

# 包含所有主效应的模型
model_3_main <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~  condition + shapes + ismatch + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
)

# 不包含condition的模型
model_no_condition <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~  shapes + ismatch + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
)

# 不包含shapes的模型
model_no_shapes <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~  condition + ismatch + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
)
# 不包含ismatch的模型
model_no_ismatch <- BayesFactor::lmBF(
  formula = RT_m ~  condition + shapes + subj_idx,
  data = df,
  whichRandom = "subj_idx",
  progress = FALSE,
  posterior = FALSE,
)
```

```{r}
# 三阶交互效应BF
bf_3way <- full_model / model_no_3way
print(paste("3阶交互效应BF：", format(extractBF(bf_3way)$bf, scientific = TRUE, digits = 4)))

# 计算condition:shapes二阶交互效应BF
bf_2way_condition_shapes <- model_no_3way / model_no_condition_shapes
print(paste("condition:shapes二阶交互效应BF：", format(extractBF(bf_2way_condition_shapes)$bf, scientific = TRUE, digits = 4)))

# 计算condition:ismatch二阶交互效应BF
bf_2way_condition_ismatch <- model_no_3way / model_no_condition_ismatch
print(paste("condition:ismatch二阶交互效应BF：", format(extractBF(bf_2way_condition_ismatch)$bf, scientific = TRUE, digits = 4)))

# 计算shapes*mismatch二阶交互效应BF
bf_2way_shapes_ismatch <- model_no_3way / model_no_shapes_ismatch
print(paste("shapes*mismatch二阶交互效应BF：", format(extractBF(bf_2way_shapes_ismatch)$bf, scientific = TRUE, digits = 4)))
```

```{r}
# 可视化贝叶斯因子序列分析
# 初始化变量
n_subjects <- length(unique(df$subj_idx))
bf_3way_history <- numeric(n_subjects)
stop_flag <- FALSE

# 按被试增量进行序贯分析
for (i in 5:n_subjects) {  # 从第5个被试开始（最小样本量）
  # 截取前i个被试的数据
  df_subset <- df[df$subj_idx %in% unique(df$subj_idx)[1:i], ]
  cat("计算被试数:", i, "\n")

  
  # 计算三阶交互作用的BF
  bf_full <- lmBF(
    formula = RT_m ~ condition*shapes*ismatch + subj_idx,
    data = df_subset,
    whichRandom = "subj_idx",
    progress = FALSE
  )



  bf_no_3way <- lmBF(
    formula = RT_m ~ condition + shapes + ismatch +
        condition:shapes + condition:ismatch + shapes:ismatch + subj_idx,
    data = df_subset,
    whichRandom = "subj_idx",
    progress = FALSE
  )
  
  
  bf_3way <- bf_full / bf_no_3way
  bf_value <- extractBF(bf_3way)$bf
  
  # 记录当前BF
  bf_3way_history[i] <- bf_value
  cat(bf_3way_history)
  
  # 检查停止条件 (BF10 > 10 或 BF10 < 1/10)
  if (bf_value > 10 || bf_value < 0.1) {
    message(sprintf("停止收集数据! 被试数=%d, BF=%.2f", i, bf_value))
    # stop_flag <- TRUE
    # break
  }
}

```

```{r}
# 创建包含所有信息的数据框
plot_data <- data.frame(
  n_subjects = 1:n_subjects,
  bf = bf_3way_history
)
plot_data <- plot_data[!is.na(plot_data$bf), ]

ggplot(plot_data, aes(x = n_subjects, y = bf)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue", size = 3) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = c(0.1, 10), linetype = "dashed", color = "red") +
  scale_y_log10() +
  labs(title = "贝叶斯因子序列分析",
       subtitle = "三阶交互作用 (condition × shapes × ismatch)",
       x = "被试数量", y = "贝叶斯因子 (BF10)") +
  # scale_x_continuous(breaks = scales::breaks_pretty())
  theme_minimal()
```
